mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( USER_ID, USER_PW, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, NICKNAME, GENDER, GU_NUMBER, SECURITY_QUESTION, SECURITY_ANSWER, BIRTHDATE, INTRODUCTION, PROFILE_IMAGE, JOIN_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{guNumber}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{birthDate}, #{introduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{profileImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET profile_image = COALESCE(#{profileImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile_image), introduction = COALESCE(#{introduction, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction) WHERE user_id = #{userId}

UPDATE users SET email = COALESCE(#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email), phone_number = COALESCE(#{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number), nickname = COALESCE(#{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname), gu_number = COALESCE(#{guNumber, jdbcType=INTEGER}, gu_number) WHERE user_id = #{userId}
